alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 2:31PM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. In Utah, Tavaputs Plateau and La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight Wednesday night to midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Tavaputs Plateau
